column4: hello, i have ubuntu server running in home server with openssh installed, i have open port 22 on my router but i cant connect from internet, what should i do?
also make sure that in /etc/ssh/sshd_config you have set it up to proper interface
what should i do in sshd_config, i was looking for
is running the server, but, what line should i change?
none, by default it listens on all interfaces
but i cant connect from internet, ListenAddress is width comment
are you near this machine perhaps?
i'm connect with ssh from myu local network
so you can ssh to it from local network but not from the internet?
then use this website: https://www.grc.com/x/ne.dll?bh0bkyd2 to verify that your firewall is set up properly
the port is open, i think is sshd configuration
then check it and consult it with "man sshd_config" if in doubt
